pli-tv-pvr14:3.1: jimhaṃ → jivhaṃ (si) | parisakappikena → parisakappiyena (bj, s1-3, pts1); parisaṅkappikena (si)
pli-tv-pvr14:4.1: na bāhāvikkhepakaṃ → na vācāvikkhepakaṃ (s1-3) | mando hāsetabbo → mando pahāsetabbo (bj) | vepo pahāsetabbo (s1-3) | pariggahetvā → uggahetvā (s1-3, pts1) | na chandāgatiṃ gantabbaṃ → na chandāgati gantabbā (bj, s1-3, pts1)
